lead_paragraph: YAMPOL--Laurie Praver, 61, of Cove Neck, NY and Aventura, FL, passed away on April 21, 2016 after a long illness. Laurie left us as she lived, with gentle, peaceful grace. She was a kind and loving person to all she met. Her beautiful life added happiness to those of all she knew. The comfort of others was of prime importance to her always. Laurie leaves behind her beloved husband, Barry, and their precious little Sophia. She also leaves behind a large, loving family and circle of dear friends. A private, graveside service will be held on Monday, April 25. In lieu of flowers, donations in Laurie's memory to a charity of your choice will be greatly appreciated. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  YAMPOL, LAURIE PRAVER
